name: GeoConnection
description:
A 2D Platformer puzzle/parkour game. Try not to rage as you are a small square which has the goal of CONNECTING blocks to overcome obstacles and arrive to the end. You are also able to shoot blocks out of the air to help you in your journey.

Will you be able to overcome the difficulties involved in reaching the end portal? Enjoy!

COMMANDS ARE SIMPLE (Tutorial Level explains it all):

- "A" and "D" to move

- Space to jump

- "B" to exit

"If you can shoot,  "W" and "S" to aim and "L" to shoot
